metadata.title: CVE-2014-2524 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The _rl_tropen function in util.c in GNU readline before 6.3 patch 3 allowslocal users to create or overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack ona /var/tmp/rltrace.[PID] file.

criterions.comment: readline6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
